name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with tomato, mozzarella, basil, and olive oil. No meat or fish ingredients.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh tomato slices layered with mozzarella, basil, and balsamic drizzle.

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Skewered paneer cubes marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled with peppers and onions.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Assorted vegetables tossed in soy-garlic sauce over noodles or rice. No animal protein.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Ground chickpea patties wrapped with tahini, lettuce, cucumber, and tomato.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded eggplant layered with marinara and mozzarella, baked until bubbly.

name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy dip of spinach, artichokes, cream cheese, and parmesan, served with bread.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy arborio rice cooked with vegetable stock, mushrooms, and parmesan.

name: Chana Masala
description: North Indian chickpea curry simmered with tomatoes, onion, and garam masala.

name: Greek Salad
description: Crisp lettuce, cucumber, tomato, olives, and feta with lemon-oregano dressing.

name: Vegetable Dumplings
description: Steamed dumplings stuffed with cabbage, carrot, mushroom, ginger, and garlic.

name: Tofu Pad Thai
description: Rice noodles stir-fried with tamarind sauce, tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, and lime.

name: Garden Burger
description: Vegetable-based burger patty made from beans, grains, and mushrooms with lettuce and tomato.

name: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty soup with lentils, carrots, celery, and tomato cooked in vegetable broth.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Grilled sourdough topped with smashed avocado, lemon, chili flakes, and microgreens.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in cream sauce with grilled chicken breast slices.

name: Beef Burger
description: Grilled beef patty with cheddar, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a brioche bun.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Garlic butter saut√©ed shrimp served over linguine with white wine sauce.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and cured pepperoni slices baked on pizza dough.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked shredded pork tossed in barbecue sauce, served with slaw on a bun.

name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Pan-seared salmon glazed with sweet soy teriyaki sauce, served with rice.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Romaine lettuce with grilled chicken, parmesan, croutons, and anchovy dressing.

name: Lamb Gyro
description: Sliced roasted lamb wrapped in pita with tzatziki, tomato, and onion.

name: Tuna Sandwich
description: Albacore tuna salad with mayo and celery on toasted bread or croissant.

name: Bacon Omelette
description: Fluffy eggs folded with smoked bacon, cheddar cheese, and scallions.

name: Seafood Paella
description: Spanish saffron rice cooked with shrimp, mussels, calamari, and chorizo.

name: Turkey Club
description: Triple-decker sandwich with roasted turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

name: Ham and Cheese Croissant
description: Buttery croissant stuffed with smoked ham and melted Swiss cheese.
